title: This Cockatoo Was Rescued After She Was Battered By A Huge Cyclone And People Are So Happy - BuzzFeed News
text:
“After having a bit of a rest he seems really active now,” she told The Townsville Bulletin. BuzzFeed News has contacted Sweeney for comment.
